subject: RE: [junit] fileset wildcard question

You have haltonfailure=3Dtrue, which means the ant task will grind to a ha=
lt as soon as any error occurs.

The batch test above seems to include only=
 files that end in Test in the working directory:

  <fileset dir=3D"build/=
test" includes=3D"*Test.class" />

However, the test below that is failing =
includes every file that ends in Test in the working directory AND every su=
bdirectory (that's the "**/" prefix -- check out the Ant documentation on f=
ilesets.)

  <fileset dir=3D"build/test" includes=3D"**/*Test.class" />

It=
 looks like the second version runs tests that the first version isn't runn=
ing - and those extra tests are failing.  Do you recognize the test "sipenu=
m.NAPTRTest" that is failing?


Daniel Wellman
U.S. Trust
Ph: (201) 533-615=
7
